data.title: Potential! Good flavor and value....
data.text: So we recently moved into the area and have been looking for a crispy thin crust, with a savory sauce, and flavorful toppings. This is the 5th place we have tried. The sauce and toppings were great! Not to sweet on the sauce and the sausage was flavorful and not overly greasy. It got marked down on stars because the crust tastes pre made and even looks like it. It's thin and not bad, just tastes packaged. We will give it another try sometime. Staff was friendly and clearly a family run place.

data.title: Greasy and Burnt
data.text: Finally tried this pizza joint. We have a LOT of pizza places in the area, but wanted to try a local, non chain place. Big mistake. Horrible pizza. It was so greasy our fingers were wet. The pizza was burnt and perhaps as tasty as the wet cardboard it was on.

data.title: AMAZING PIZZA!!!
data.text: If you want real amazing Chicago pizza, made with real quality, then this place should be your number one spot to order from! Forget Papa Johns, Pizza hut, and Dominos, they don't hold a candle to Italian Villa!! You won't regret it!
